Tazavesh: Soleahs Gambit Guide

11.2 - Ghosts of K'aresh
5 5

Playback speed
1x Normal

Last Updated:August 5, 2025|Changelog

Welcome to the Tazavesh: So'leah's Gambit Mythic+ guide for the World of Warcraft patch 11.2! This guide covers everything you need to know about your upcoming dungeon runs!

Route

Patch 11.2 - Ghosts of K'aresh
Tazavesh: So'leah's Gambit

It is recommended to use the Mythic Dungeon Tools addon to look at your route and mob count before the Mythic+ dungeon starts. Below you can see an example of a Weekly Route meant for +10 keys or lower.

Simply import the route into the Mythic Dungeon Tool addon and take a look at it with your group.

Weekly Route

Utility Needs

Patch 11.2 - Ghosts of K'aresh
Tazavesh: So'leah's Gambit
Enrage
Bleed
Magic Dispel
  • Cry of Mrrggllrrgg
    • An Enrage buff increasing damage dealt of any murloc affected by it.
  • Super Saison
    • An Enrage buff increasing damage dealt of Burly Deckhand.
  • Common utility examples:
    • Hunter
      • Tranquilizing Shot
    • Rogue
      • Shiv
    • Druid
      • Soothe
    • Evoker
      • Oppressing Roar         with
        Overawe
    • Monk
      • Paralysis         with
        Pressure Points
  • Shuriken Blitz
    • A Bleed effect inflicting physical damage over time.
  • Common utility examples:
    • Evoker
      • Cauterizing Flame
    • Paladin
      • Blessing of Protection
  • Time Bomb
    • A Magic debuff increasing players haste by 30% but also inflicting arcane damage that is increased by 10% every time it deals damage.
  • Common utility examples:
    • Priest
      • Mass Dispel
    • Warlock
      • Singe Magic

Hylbrande Trash Area

Patch 11.2 - Ghosts of K'aresh
Tazavesh: So'leah's Gambit
Murkbrine Shellcrusher
Murkbrine Fishmancer
Murkbrine Scalebinder
Coastwalker Goliath
Stormforged Guardian
  • Required Enrage Dispel:
    • Cry of Mrrggllrrgg
      • Applies an Enrage to all nearby murlocs, increasing damage dealt by 50% for 30 seconds.
  • Shellcracker
    • Knocks an enemy back, inflicting physical damage to it.
  • Required Kick:
    • Waterbolt
      • Deals frost damage to a random player.
  • Volatile Pufferfish
    • Throws an empowered pufferfish which explodes.
  • Invigorating Fish Stick
    • Creates a totem to protect all nearby murlocs, decreasing damage taken by 25% and healing damage every 3 seconds.
  • Tidal Stomp
    • Stomps the ground, inflicting frost damage to all players.
  • Boulder Throw
    • Inflicts physical damage to all enemies within 5 yards and knocks them down for 2 seconds.
  • Crackle
    • Creates a line of lightning that inflicts nature damage every second to players standing within the area.
  • Charged Pulse
    • Unleashes a blast of electrical energy, inflicting nature damage to all enemies within 12 yards, knocking them back.

Hylbrande

Patch 11.2 - Ghosts of K'aresh
Tazavesh: So'leah's Gambit
Overview
Purifying Burst
Shearing Swings
Titanic Crash
Purged by Fire
Sanitizing Cycle
  • Cleave Vault Purifiers and interrupt them.
  • Always be ready to run away from
    Purged by Fire     as it hits extremely hard.
  • Spread around to have an easier time dealing with the
    Sanitizing Cycle     phase.
  • As a tank, always aim the
    Titanic Crash     away from the group.
  • Hylbrande creates a ball of energy and splits it into missiles, striking enemies with holy damage.
  • Hylbrande takes two consecutive swings at his primary target, inflicting physical damage.
  • Hylbrande slams his sword down, inflicting physical damage to all players in front of him and stunning them for 4 seconds.
  • Hylbrande orders a turret to focus intense energy towards a player's feet, inflicting holy damage every 0.5 seconds to players who remain in the area, and leaving behind a
    Purging Field     that inflicts holy damage to players every 1.5 seconds until cancelled.
  • Hylbrande channels titan power from the chamber to purge all unauthorized life forms as a safety measure, becoming immune to damage and filling the room with a
    Sanitizing Field    .
  • Bypass Codes appear near Hylbrande and can be picked up by players and deposited into nearby security panels.
  • Players can access the titan console in the rear of the chamber to gain
    Titanic Insight    , allowing them to confirm where each code must be placed.
    • Inputting the wrong bypass code into a security panel inflicts holy damage and stuns the player for 3 seconds.

Timecap'n Hooktail Trash Area

Patch 11.2 - Ghosts of K'aresh
Tazavesh: So'leah's Gambit
Burly Deckhand
Hourglass Tidesage
Corsair Officer
  • Required Enrage Dispel:
    • Super Saison
      • Applies an Enrage buff, increasing damage dealt by 100%.
  • Required Kick:
    • Brackish Bolt
      • Inflicts frost damage to the target.
  • Tidal Burst
    • Conjures a watery explosion at a player's location, inflicting frost damage to players within 6 yards and knocking them into the air.
  • Sword Toss
    • Inflicts physical damage to a random player and ricochets to additional targets within 8 yards.

Timecap'n Hooktail

Patch 11.2 - Ghosts of K'aresh
Tazavesh: So'leah's Gambit
Overview
Infinite Breath
Time Bomb
Deadly Seas
  • Don't try to kill the Corsair Brutes manually and let the tank kill them with an
    Infinite Breath    .
  • Throughout the fight, Corsair Cannoneers will be spawning fire puddles on the ground at your feet. For that reason, the strat is going to be to move together as a group in line along the wall. That way all the adds are also going to run in the same place and it will be easier to kill them with a frontal.
  • Press a defensive cooldown on high stacks of
    Time Bomb    .
  • Hooktail's powerful breath inflicts arcane damage and stuns players within a frontal cone for 3 seconds.
    • Corsair Brutes hit by
      Infinite Breath       are killed instantly.
  • Timecap'n Hooktail attaches
    Time Bombs     to 2 players increasing their haste by 30% but also inflicting arcane damage every second for 30 seconds.
    Time Bomb's     damage is increased by 10% every time it inflicts damage.
    • This is a Magic debuff and can be dispelled.
  • Removing
    Time Bomb     causes a
    Temporal Detonation     inflicting arcane damage to all players.
  • The seas in this area are swarming with hungry sharks. Players who linger in the water are quickly devoured.

So'leah Trash Area

Patch 11.2 - Ghosts of K'aresh
Tazavesh: So'leah's Gambit
Devoted Accomplice
Adorned Starseer
Focused Ritualist
  • Teleport
    • Teleports to a location.
  • Drifting Star
    • Inflicts shadow damage and knocks back enemies caught in the path.
  • Wandering Pulsar
    • Summons a wandering pulsar that periodically inflicts arcane damage to all players.
  • Required Kick:
    • Hyperlight Bolt
      • Inflicts arcane damage to the target.
    • Unstable Rift
      • Inflicts arcane damage to all players within 60 yards.

So'leah

Patch 11.2 - Ghosts of K'aresh
Tazavesh: So'leah's Gambit
Overview
Hyperlight Spark
Collapsing Star
Summon Assassins
Power Overwhelming
Hyperlight Jolt
Energy Fragmentation
Hyperlight Nova
  • During the first phase, cleave the adds and interrupt them. Use a defensive cooldown whenever you are soaking the
    Collapsing Star    .
  • During the intermission, spread around the boss and aim the
    Hyperlight Jolt     at relics. Make sure to be full health during it otherwise you are in danger of dying.
  • During the last phase, move together as a group away from relics to have an easier time dodging during the
    Energy Fragmentation    . But don't go too far away from them as at some point you will have to come back and soak the
    Collapsing Star    .
  • So'leah creates a
    Hyperlight Spark     that jumps between all players, inflicting arcane damage.
  • So'leah forms an orb containing 4 charges of collapsing energy that persist for 30 seconds. Each time a player comes into contact with the
    Collapsing Star     it consumes a charge to apply collapsing energy to all players, inflicting arcane damage every second for 3 seconds.
    • All remaining charges of collapsing energy are consumed when the
      Collapsing Star       expires.
  • So'leah summons elite assassins to assist her.
    • So'Cartel Assassins are highly mobile and cast a
      Shuriken Blitz      , a volley of shurikens inflicting physical damage to all players and causing them to bleed.
      • Can be interrupted.
  • So'leah links herself to the relics, drawing upon their power to reduce all damage taken by 99% while linked.
  • So'leah unleashes a blast of energy through all players inflicting arcane damage in a line between each player and increasing damage taken from
    Hyperlight Jolt     by 25% for 15 seconds.
    • Striking a relic with
      Hyperlight Jolt       disrupts its link with So'leah.
  • So'leah triggers a violent reaction in a relic, releasing energy fragments in several directions. Players caught in the path of an energy fragment are knocked away and suffer arcane damage and an additional arcane damage every 2 seconds for 6 seconds.
  • So'leah and the relics erupt, inflicting arcane damage to players within 14 yards.

Lootpool

Patch 11.2 - Ghosts of K'aresh
Tazavesh: So'leah's Gambit
Trinkets/Jewelry
Weapons
Armor

Cloth
